name: Infinite Hockey
description:
Infinite Hockey is a casual puzzle game that is meant to frustrate you.  Slide through 10 different levels and reach the other side to win. Once, you finish the tenth level it all starts again except you go faster. See how many times you can complete all ten levels(if you can complete them at all). This game is in early development so there may be bugs and glitches. The game will be updated as frequently as possible.

Download Instruction:

1. Download .Zip Folder

2. Locate .Zip Folder

3. Extract .Zip
